headline: Broadridge to Participate in Upcoming Investor Events
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR) announced that it will be participating at three upcoming investor events. Two of these events will include fireside chats with management, which will be available on Broadridge's Investor Relations page at www.broadridge-ir.com.
